meta.title_zh: 付款方式：現金、刷卡、行動支付

dialogue.zh:
嗨 那裡. Paying today?
こんにちは there. Paying today?

是的.
はい.

dialogue.text: Your total is one hundred twenty.
dialogue.zh:
Your total 是 one hundred twenty.
Your total 私 one hundred twenty.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: How would you like to pay?
dialogue.zh:
How would 你 like to pay?
How would あなた like to pay?

可以 我 use Apple Pay?
できます 私 use Apple Pay?

dialogue.text: Yes. Please tap your phone here.
dialogue.zh:
是的. 請 tap your phone here.
はい. お願いします tap your phone here.

Alright.
Alright.

dialogue.text: If it doesn’t work, we can use a card.
dialogue.zh:
If it doesn’t work, we 可以 use a 卡.
If it doesn’t work, we できます use a カード.

好的.
わかりました.

It says ‘processing’.
It says ‘processing’.

我’ll wait.
私’ll wait.

Approved. 你’re good.
Approved. あなた’re good.

太好了.
いいですね.

Would 你 like a 發票?
Would あなた like a レシート?

不, 謝謝 你.
いいえ, ありがとう あなた.

你 需要 a 袋子?
Do あなた 必要 a 袋?

不 袋子.
いいえ 袋.

Alright. Anything else?
Alright. Anything else?

dialogue.text: Actually, can I pay part cash?
dialogue.zh:
Actually, 可以 我 pay part 現金?
Actually, できます 私 pay part 現金?

We 可以 split it.
We できます split it.

dialogue.text: Okay, fifty cash and the rest card.
dialogue.zh:
好的, fifty 現金 and the rest 卡.
わかりました, fifty 現金 and the rest カード.

dialogue.text: Sure. Please hand me the cash first.
dialogue.zh:
當然. 請 hand me the 現金 first.
もちろん. お願いします hand me the 現金 first.

Here’s fifty.
Here’s fifty.

dialogue.text: Now insert or tap your card.
dialogue.zh:
Now insert or tap your 卡.
Now insert or tap your カード.

(Pays with 卡)
(Pays with カード)

Done. 有 a nice day.
Done. Have a nice day.

謝謝!
ありがとう!

See 你 next time.
See あなた next time.

Bye!
Bye!
